ProductInfo.Features:
ZMODO PKC-4094S15 Weatherproof Color IR Outdoor Security Camera Kit.  Same as ZMD-P4-BARAZ4ZN.
1/4" Color CMOS Image Sensor, 480 TV Lines, Horizontal, 6mm Lens, Signal: NTSC, Night Vision Min. Light: 0 Lux (IR On)
IR Irradiation Distance: up to 30', Operation Temperature: -25F~122F, Weatherproof: Yes
Power: 12V DC, Mount: Ceiling or Wall, Video Connector: BNC, Power Connector: RCA 12V DC, Color: Black
Package includes: (4) CM-C21606BK Outdoor Color IR Security Camera, (4) W-VP1018 50ft Video + Power All-in-one Cable for Security Camera, (1) PS-115 12V 1500mA 4 Port Power Supply for Surveillance Camera, (1) PAC-1-4 Power Supply Connector 1 Female to 4 Males
ProductInfo.Name: ZMODO PKC-4094S15 Weatherproof Color IR Outdoor Security Camera Kit, includes 4x CM-C21606BK Outdoor Color IR Security Camera, 4x W-VP1018 50ft Video + Power All-in-one Cable for Security Camera, 1x PS-115 12V 1500mA 4 Port Power Supply for Surveillance Camera and 1x PAC-1-4 Power Supply Connector 1 Female to 4 Males
